Operation 'CleanScanPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description is too minimal. 'Clean scan' lacks clarity about what cleanup entails. Added context about resource cleanup, side effects (removal of data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation and when to use it appropriately.

data.summary_suggestion: Remove scan data and cleanup resources
data.description_suggestion: Removes scan data and cleans up associated resources for the scan identified by the provided scanId. This operation performs cleanup of temporary files and database entries related to the scan. Returns confirmation of successful cleanup operation.
data.reasoning: Original description is too minimal. 'Clean scan' lacks clarity about what cleanup entails. Added context about resource cleanup, side effects (removal of data), and expected response to help AI agents understand the destructive nature of this operation and when to use it appropriately.

message: Operation 'StatusScansPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but description lacks detail about what status information is returned. Added clarity about return value structure and what data is included in the response for better AI agent decision-making.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current status of all active and recently completed scans. Returns a collection of scan status objects containing scan identifiers, current execution state, progress information, and timestamps for each scan.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description lacks detail about what status information is returned. Added clarity about return value structure and what data is included in the response for better AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'StatusScanPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_output_details. Summary is clear but description is too brief. Added details about what status information is returned and the structure of the response to enable AI agents to understand the available data and use it appropriately.

data.current_description: Status of a scan identified by id.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the current execution status of a specific scan identified by scanId. Returns a status object containing the scan's current state, progress percentage, execution time, and any error messages if applicable.
data.reasoning: Summary is clear but description is too brief. Added details about what status information is returned and the structure of the response to enable AI agents to understand the available data and use it appropriately.

message: Operation 'StopScansPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description lacks context about the operation's impact. Added clarity about the immediate termination behavior, state transition, and return value to help AI agents understand this is a forceful operation with significant side effects.

data.description_suggestion: Terminates all currently running scans immediately. This operation halts all active scan processes and transitions them to a stopped state. Returns a summary of stopped scans including count and identifiers of affected scans.
data.reasoning: Description lacks context about the operation's impact. Added clarity about the immediate termination behavior, state transition, and return value to help AI agents understand this is a forceful operation with significant side effects.

message: Operation 'StopScanPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is too minimal and doesn't convey the immediate termination behavior or side effects. Added context about the forceful nature of the operation and what response to expect for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Stop a scan identified by id.
data.description_suggestion: Terminates a specific scan identified by scanId immediately. This operation halts the scan's execution and transitions it to a stopped state. Returns confirmation of the stop operation including the affected scan identifier and final status.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal and doesn't convey the immediate termination behavior or side effects. Added context about the forceful nature of the operation and what response to expect for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'GetFindingPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Summary is adequate but description lacks important context. Added clarity that findings are only available for completed scans, specified the return type (Findings array), and described what information each finding contains to improve AI agent interpretability.

data.description_suggestion: Retrieves security findings and vulnerabilities discovered by a completed scan identified by scanId. Returns a Findings array containing detected issues with severity levels, descriptions, and remediation guidance. Only available for scans in completed state.
data.reasoning: Summary is adequate but description lacks important context. Added clarity that findings are only available for completed scans, specified the return type (Findings array), and described what information each finding contains to improve AI agent interpretability.

message: Operation 'StartScanPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Description is too minimal. Added context about input requirements (ScanDefinition), what the response contains (scanId), and important operational detail that scans execute asynchronously. This helps AI agents understand how to use the operation and what to expect afterward.

data.description_suggestion: Initiates a new security scan with the provided ScanDefinition parameters. Accepts scan configuration including target, scan type, and options. Returns a scan object containing the assigned scanId and initial status. The scan begins execution asynchronously and can be monitored via the status endpoints.
data.reasoning: Description is too minimal. Added context about input requirements (ScanDefinition), what the response contains (scanId), and important operational detail that scans execute asynchronously. This helps AI agents understand how to use the operation and what to expect afterward.

message: Operation 'getDefaultPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original summary and description are too generic and don't convey purpose. 'Index page' and 'Return index page' lack context about what the endpoint does and why an AI agent would use it. message: Operation 'getLivenessPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details, poor_ai_interpretability. Original description lacks clarity about the operational purpose. 'Liveness page' doesn't explain this is a health check endpoint. Improved version clarifies this is for monitoring service availability and explains the expected response type for AI agent interpretation.

data.description_suggestion: Returns the liveness status of the Patrowl Engine service. This endpoint is used for health checks to verify the engine is running and responsive. Returns a liveness status response indicating whether the service is alive and operational.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity about the operational purpose. 'Liveness page' doesn't explain this is a health check endpoint. Improved version clarifies this is for monitoring service availability and explains the expected response type for AI agent interpretation.

message: Operation 'getReadinessPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_output_details, inconsistent_terminology, poor_ai_interpretability. Description incorrectly says 'liveness page' instead of 'readiness page' - inconsistent terminology. Original summary is vague. Improved version clarifies readiness checks if the engine is ready to perform scans (different from liveness which just checks if it's running), and specifies the response type.

data.description_suggestion: Returns the readiness status of the Patrowl Engine service. This endpoint verifies the engine is ready to accept scan requests and has all dependencies initialized. Returns a readiness status response indicating whether the service is ready for operations.
data.reasoning: Description incorrectly says 'liveness page' instead of 'readiness page' - inconsistent terminology. Original summary is vague. Improved version clarifies readiness checks if the engine is ready to perform scans (different from liveness which just checks if it's running), and specifies the response type.

data.description_suggestion: Executes a diagnostic test of the Patrowl Engine to verify core functionality and connectivity. This endpoint performs internal tests to ensure the engine is functioning correctly. Returns test results indicating success or failure of diagnostic checks.
data.reasoning: Original description is too vague and doesn't indicate what action is performed. 'Test page' doesn't clarify this is a diagnostic endpoint. Improved version explains this performs functional verification and specifies what the response contains for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'reloadConfigurationPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Summary is awkward ('page' terminology is inconsistent with action-oriented description). Description lacks detail about what happens and side effects. Improved version clarifies the action, specifies the response, and documents potential side effects for AI agent awareness.

data.description_suggestion: Reloads the Patrowl Engine configuration from the configuration file. This operation causes the engine to re-read and apply configuration settings without requiring a service restart. Returns confirmation of successful reload. Side effect: Active scans may be affected if configuration changes impact scan behavior.
data.reasoning: Summary is awkward ('page' terminology is inconsistent with action-oriented description). Description lacks detail about what happens and side effects. Improved version clarifies the action, specifies the response, and documents potential side effects for AI agent awareness.

data.description_suggestion: Returns detailed information about the Patrowl Engine including version, capabilities, supported scan types, and configuration details. message: Operation 'CleanScansPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_output_details, missing_side_effects. Original description lacks clarity about what 'clean' means and what the consequences are. Missing information about side effects and response format. Improved version clarifies the destructive nature of the operation, specifies what happens to active scans, and documents data loss risks for AI agent awareness.

data.summary_suggestion: Clean and remove all active scans
data.description_suggestion: Removes and cleans all currently active scans from the Patrowl Engine. This operation terminates any in-progress scans and clears associated scan data and resources. Returns confirmation of cleanup completion. Side effects: All active scans are terminated immediately; scan results not yet persisted may be lost.
data.reasoning: Original description lacks clarity about what 'clean' means and what the consequences are. Missing information about side effects and response format. Improved version clarifies the destructive nature of the operation, specifies what happens to active scans, and documents data loss risks for AI agent awareness.
